sentences.english: The regulatory environment may require that external bodies undertake monitoring and auditing.
sentences.chinese: 法规环境可要求由外部组织进行监控与稽核。

sentences.english: C. Do you document the audits?
An accounts-checking system may be set up within an accounting body.
sentences.chinese: 会计机构内部应当建立稽核制度。

sentences.english: Is there an inspection Instruction for the specific product being audited?
sentences.chinese: 是否有对特殊产品有稽核检验指导书？

sentences.english: Is subcontractor qualification done by quality system audit and process quality analysis?
sentences.chinese: 承包商资格是否由品质系统进行稽核和过程品质分析？

sentences.english: Support the locations during customer-visits, audits and quality-improvement programs.
sentences.chinese: 支持客户参观，稽核和提高品质等项目。

sentences.english: The thesis studies the ISR and the reform of it in three parts.
sentences.chinese: 本文分三个部分对盐务稽核所及其改革进行了研究。

sentences.english: Waiting for the formal AAS audit to ask these types of questions is too late.
sentences.chinese: 等到正式的AAS稽核时再问这些问题就太迟了。

sentences.english: Want to accept the offer of your company managing operation auditing assistant manager probationer now one duty.
sentences.chinese: 现欲应聘贵公司管理运作稽核副经理实习生一职。

sentences.english: The auditor began the examination of accounts.
A. Do you perform audits on your manufacturing and quality control systems? Explain.
sentences.chinese: 你执行制造业和产品控制体系的稽核吗？解释。

sentences.english: These financial statements have not been audited.
sentences.chinese: 财务报表并未聘任何稽核人员进行稽查。

sentences.english: I should add that all of these records have been audited.
sentences.chinese: 我必须说明，所有的这些记录都经过稽核。

definition: to reconsider/to reexamine/to review (e.g. a report prior to accepting it)
to verify accounting records/also written 對賬|对账[dui4 zhang4]
to verify accounting records/also written 對帳|对帐[dui4 zhang4]
